bow: ruining my daughters birthdays newly single mom with two kids that turn and today and monday we ve left their abusive father or kicked him out for that matter he took the car and work just about days week bringing them with me mostly get no child support no days off besides one saturday afternoon month to visit their grandparents have no money to give them big party barely have money for gifts **never** let my emotions show and **never** put my worry on them and here am feeling sorry not only for them *but for me* on what is supposed to be celebration of their life just bought school clothes and **had** to buy car plus the 300 to register it or ca work there goes my savings out the window just want to give them birthday happy day to forget that asshole we called daddy and afraid failing feel so bad for my girls sorry to bitch and moan **need** to get this off my chest guess just need someone to listen sorry at that age small cake some balloons and their mom will probably be great day for them good on you for leaving an abusive partner that probably the biggest gift you could give your girls be strong xxx would worry too much about it kids love anything you can give them day at the zoo playground cake crafts with mommy they re only and they really do know big difference think just you enjoying the day with them and cheap outing would be fun on side note have you applied for wic food stamps and child support all of this would help you out immensely assuming you are in the us they have clean clothes roof and loving mother as they grow try to focus on the things you have many people do have instead of the things you do have know it hard do really have much either but my sons face still lights up like the sun every day do feel bad for bitching can you plan whole day for them go to the park beach neighborhood pool maybe create tiara or crown favorite foods all day etc is their roller rink or something they could go to with you know when remember my birthdays today being my 30th have been reminiscing remember the things did not the gifts got good luck every other day of the year am the most positive person in the world literally *nothing* can change my attitude towards the world but when it comes to my girls feel huge guilt that ca give them better spoil them little on their birthday applied for food stamps ca benefit from wic because food stamps basically covers all the same stuff and child support is out of the question have always worked never him he has no job he is the lowest of low abusive lazy drug addled much to *my* surprise lying **loser** rather be poor than give him the chance to act like owe him anything or the chance to see these kids alone happy birthday and you re right thank you deleted pm me please somehow ca on my phone you can receive food stamps and wic at the same time great idea thank you that what have planned picnic at the playground swimming in the pool and just ca think of anything else wallet friendly the aquarium is 24 for an adult 12 for children the zoo is just about the same it insane tourist season on the beach is terrible thank you guess that just hat needed to hear they pay for basically the same things milk cheese eggs all covered and just do need much more of them we have enough food just not **money at the moment but we will get there thank you wic pays for very select things food stamps can cover lot more stuff get both use wic for the milk eggs juice etc and then use food stamps for everything it does cover you re dead broke take advantage of what being offered deleted by getting out of that relationship you are giving your girls the best gifts possible strong example you stood up for yourself and protected your children you work hard to provide food clothes and roof over their heads what better role model could two little girls want at that young age kids do need lots of big expensive gifts they would probably be happy with cake or ice cream and letting the four yo have her pick of toys from the thrift store she wo care how much it costs or what shop it comes from just that she gets to choose you are amazing holy crap just blown away by how lucky your girls are you re not ruining anything you re just being realistic about parents expectations of kids birthday parties and reality something we all need to do regardless of financial or time situations love the consignment store idea for toys luckily live nearby to many secondhand stores where can buy gently used toys for pennies on the dollar go that route and your idea sounds so special and sweet you re great mother it sounds natural that someone like you would be worried about your daughters special days but do as the daughter of an amazing hardworking single mom in awe of you so you have problem with someone in recovery taking care of her kids you are not ruining their birthdays you are *saving* their birthdays and lives by getting away from an abusive man who has abandoned his paternal responsibilities if anyone ruined their birthdays he did the one year old will not know any difference and honestly the year old probably wo anyway do something fun with them dollar store or goodwill for gifts picnic at park free when the birthdays are over look into what it takes to make the court system garnish his wages so you get child support you rock deleted time where they are the center of attention is all that matters have friend who is mormon and home schools kids through out the years birthdays are just birthday dinners the eldest is off to college year early is perfectly happy kid and his birthday celebrations have never been more then dinner day where they are the center you are not failing your kids if your kids are amp you have to know that they want attention more than anything in the world special day doing anything out of the ordinary is perfect birthday just take them to park you do normally go to and eat cupcakes or do go anywhere at all and do the whole day in reverse or wear your clothes backwards or anything silly for the whole day have given my kids too much they ve never had to go without they are often ungrateful brats and worry that it too late as hard as it is to swallow this situation of your is gift in some ways do come from money and know my mom was in your shoes for several of my birthdays do know what it like to go without and would trade that pajama party just you and the kids sleeping in the living room and watching movies my kids live that deleted make cake and go to playground you making big deal about them and spending the day telling them how special they are is more than enough my heart hurts for you logically sure you know you did the right thing emotionally sure you re jam packed with guilt you re suddenly single you have little time for your kids money is tight and you may have even began to wonder if you even did the right thing this is temporary it hard to see that when you re right in the middle of it your daughter will probably not even remember this birthday go to the dollar store and get them several dollar gifts they have no idea of the value of toys to them quantity over quality if you act like you gave them the birthday of the year they will believe it pretend the cake is some exotic cake made by some famous chef play silly games that cost nothing and spend 16 bucks on small presents for the kids they will have no idea that this was huge amazing party food stamps ebt will pay for all your food not just select things if its food from the grocery store it is likely covered by food stamps wic provides only select things milk so much milk eggs cheese peanut butter you really can benefit from both at the same time not having to worry about food budget is amazingly helpful when you re struggling like the idea of baking the cake with them they would love that for sure you could also do little experiment things got cornstarch and water mixed together makes suuuper fun goop which is super easy to clean up with just more water add food colouring for little extra fun go outside and collect leaves twigs rocks etc or get your girls to help you collect then use glue and make some cool nature art work at daycare so have toons of fun activities and simple recipes like for plaudough which could potentially cost no money at all food stamps pays for all groceries use both food stamps and wic wic helps my food stamps go farther because my milk eggs beans etc are already covered these programs are there to help people just like you please use them if you can have thought about that but sometimes some people need just little bit of help to get ahead and sometimes you win sometimes you lose honestly just pack up picnic dinner and take them out to cool park or something for fun family day they are really too young to even realize birthdays or missing out on them but they will definitely appreciate fun day with mom my son turned at the beginning of august instead of buying him gift spent roughly 150 in gas to drive him up to my parents place so we could spend the weekend at their lake house he did even mention any gifts we did have small cake and sang happy birthday my parents gave him an itunes card to buy some new games on my ipad your guilt is totally understandable but guarantee you your kids do care you re totally not failing from what you ve posted here it sounds like you have your shit together and you re doing the absolute best you can for your family which is the most important thing in my area we have world renowned children museum if you show that you receive any sort of government assistance you can receive reduced fee or even free pass into the museum you should call around to your local attractions to see if they have any programs like that to help low income families oh god the milk alone now understand how parents always complained about going through so much milk and wic gives you about 40 50 bucks of food month id be freaking out if found set of coupons that could yield me that much savings let wic cover milk juice eggs and use the food stamps to get more meat and produce grew up in similar situation and ellski is absolutely right my mom made cake sometimes had few balloons and sang us happy birthday my sister and absolutely loved it when she remarried we were still not well off and she continued our birthday tradition my step brother loved it it was the highlight to all of our birthdays the night before she would decorate the place so when we woke up on our birthday we would see the happy birthday sign something that she picked up at the 99c store and reused each birthday and maybe some balloons when we were really young she would bring cupcakes to our class that happy birthday sign cake and her singing ended up being the thing we looked forward to the most we are all grown up and we still talk about it it is something am going to do for my kids now every year on our mom birthday one of us will sneak into the house and we do the same for her or bring cupcakes to her classroom where she teaches would add that the local or city parks and recreation department also gives out discounted or sometimes free passes for stuff too thats worth peek on their website at each of the cities have lived in you can check out museum passes for all the local museums aquarium zoo etc at the library it little know bonus at my house we had supermarket cupcakes and the birthday kid got to pick what was for dinner we did mind it they re both young yes big parties are fun but they re little and chances are they wo remember the party next year anyway just spend the day with them bake cake yourself decorate little maybe go to the park you do have to do anything big they re just little babies still the birthday stuff is more about you wanting to express your love and enjoy them and feel like good mom they wo even remember it there nothing wrong with wanting to celebrate but know that you *are* good mom you re keeping them safe and working hard for them and that what they really need for their birthday remember when was so old enough to form plenty of clear memories and my single mom had no time for me because she was working and going to college we were broke and she was busy but dhe always told me why she could spend as much time with me as she wanted and felt proud of her and loved by her so cut yourself some slack your kids need you to be happy more than they need bunch of presents big hugs for you you are nowhere near ruining these babies birthdays your oldest is four she probably does even know its her birthday get them some cupcakes take them to the park just have fun day playing with momma and they will love it first of all you need to file with child services they will make sure you get child support and all that you do have to deal with their dad maybe once to get court orders but that it they usually have self help services at your court to help you get what you need they will automatically withdraw the money from his paychecks and give it to you they will also collect any arrears back owed child support second the year old will not remember their birthday party it is mostly for family really bake some cupcakes and take some pictures my idea of birthday party is very cheap this is what we do bake cake or cupcakes let my daughter pick the flavor yay baking aisle at the grocery store and frosting balloons do need them we re in global helium shortage http www livescience com 38990 looming helium shortage html anyway so you re being ugh conscientious 10 pizza costco pizza cheap and serves lots of folks you do not need membership for this btw bottle drinks store brand 2l or 3l bottles no one cares 500 plates 100 cups 50 roll paper towels pick up pack of cheapo plates and cups at costco or walmart while you re there do forget plenty of napkins bring roll or two of papertowels online make some invites you can use plain paper print them keep it simple or if you have everyone email addresses use evite free to make and no postage assuming you have about 20 people at the party this would run you about cake mix pizzas bottles of soda set of fine china 50 too much cut out the pizza 30 in my estimate so your party would run you around 20 just have cake and punch party you are not obligated to serve everyone just have it at non meal time like 4pm it is totally etiquette correct to do this hell it used to be extremely common to have wedding reception like this so pretty sure day party would be totally fine you do not need to have favors but if you really feel like you do pick up roll of stickers kids do need that much really teach them that the party is about celebrating their life not about stuff hope this helps your gift is the party everyone else will bring their own gifts for your kid your kids are likely no dudley dursleys and wo count the number of presents each year to compare how many they ve gotten year to year bake one batch of cupcakes hide half of them for the second birthday one batch of white frosting split in half food coloring to make them separate colors pack up what would normally be for dinner and take it to the park for picnic birthday celebration playing in the park is just as awesome to kids as going somewhere to be honest your kids are going to remember their first and fourth birthday parties anyway have you tried food pantry you could ask for cake or ingredients to make it love this thank you lt love this idea could you send me some more ideas for at home crafts this is great thank you love this idea could you send me some more ideas for at home crafts this is great thank you love this idea could you send me some more ideas for at home crafts this is great thank you love this thank you lt lt amazing hope my girls turn out as awesome as you did you get cupcakes thank you great pricing fifty bucks is just about all have so sure monday will work out thank you you re welcome it does have to be fancy this is how we ve always done my daughter birthday party it the folks who show up who make it special you do even need to do games or anything seriously have them play tag or something also another bonus of local park trash they have trash cans everywhere so you do have to deal with the garbage at home if my mom took me to the park and let me eat cake in the morning that would be the best birthday ever lolllllll wish did save some pop bottles fill them up with water some baby oil and sparkles beads food colouring or whatever else you want glue the lid on the bottle and youve got little shaker things that seperates all cool like quick play dough recipe would just be flour salt and water food colouring if you want this dough you wont be able to save have better recipe too tho if you dont have paint or money for paint food colouring and water can make beautiful water colour paintings sing songs and read books too kids always love interactive stuff make sure you only handle the straight food colouring tho as it stains ve been in the exact position as you few years ago and it made me tear up to read your post it crushing that guilt we want to give them everything but as someone who lived through it can say that it will get easier hope their birthday is amazing try not to stress that being said one free trip my kiddos love is the fire station we just went in and asked them nicely for tour kids could climb in the fire truck and everything another favorite is the library even when we do check out books they still love to sit around and read or play games good luck to you on your journey totally agree here grew up with little to no money but my mom would decorate and make cake one year she made me strawberry shortcake cake thought it was the most beautiful thing had ever seen look at pictures now and laugh but at the time it was beautiful we would have party which amounted to nothing more than cake and candles but it was enough did know any different basically as long as you re there for them spending time with them and making their day special you are not ruining their birthday deleted there are lots of fun things you can do together to enjoy their birthdays and make them feel special just spending time together is the best gift you can give you can bake cake together decorate cards banners and hang them up let the birthday child feel extra special by letting them select what to have for dinner or what game you ll play you can go to nearby park or pick out special treat at 99 cent store bubbles can provide hours of fun put on some music and have dance party you are doing great hang in there sub is suboxone which is the medication you take to stay off opiates hang out there to support some awesome people in that sub and do want donations thought card from someone would be nifty is all also if you read it in context it was to someone who said am the only the one who does need opiates and just gets up and goes to work in which said the same way mine too
